data.name: BookReturnPeriodFirst
data.value: There are 2 weeks left until the end of the book "{0}" return period.
data.comment: The message for the user who must return the specified book within two weeks.

data.name: BookReturnPeriodSecond
data.value: There are 1 week left until the end of the book "{0}" return period.
data.comment: The message for the user who must return the specified book within one week.

data.name: BookReturnPeriodThird
data.value: There are 3 days left until the end of the book "{0}" return period.
data.comment: The message for the user who must return the specified book within three days.

data.name: BooksLibrary
data.value: These books are in our library.
data.comment: The message when we see the result of the search for books in the library

data.name: BooksLibraryNew
data.value: These are new books in our library.
data.comment: The message when we see the result of the search for new books in the library.

data.name: BooksReturnTill
data.value: Return till: {0}
data.comment: The message when the user looks at his books, the date before which the books need to be returned

data.name: BorrowBookQuestion
data.value: Are you sure you want to borrow the book "{0}"?
data.comment: The question when a user try to borrow the book

data.name: Chat_DbName
data.value: Chats
data.comment: The name of the document with chats in the database

data.name: ChooseFilters
data.value: Choose categories for books.
data.comment: The message when a user sees all the filters

data.name: ChooseOptions
data.value: Hey, I'm LibBot. Choose the option.
data.comment: The message describing the sections of the main menu.

data.name: Code_DbName
data.value: Codes
data.comment: The name of the document with codes in the database

data.name: EmptyLibrary
data.value: There are no such books in our library.
data.comment: The message when when no books were found according to the specified parameters

data.name: EmptyLibrarySearchQuery
data.value: Sorry, we can't find books with that name in our library.
data.comment: The message when the query entered by the user does not match the name of any of the books in SharePoint.

data.name: EmptyUserLibrary
data.value: You don't read any books now.
data.comment: The message when a user don't read any books now

data.name: EnterBook
data.value: Please, enter book's name.
data.comment: The message when a user in search query section and needs enter book's name for find it.

data.name: EnterCode
data.value: Please, check your email and enter your auth code here.
data.comment: The message when a user needs to check his code in his mail and enter it.

data.name: EnterFeedback
data.value: Please, enter your feedback.
data.comment: The message when a user in feedback section and needs enter feeback.

data.name: EnterLogin
data.value: Please, enter your outlook email or outlook login.
data.comment: The message when a user needs enter his username or email to find him in SharePoint.

data.name: ExpiredCode
data.value: Code lifetime was expired.
data.comment: The message when the code expired

data.name: Feedback_DbName
data.value: Feedbacks
data.comment: The name of the document with feedbacks in the database

data.name: FileName
data.value: bookPaths.txt
data.comment: The name of file where store all filters for books.

data.name: LogErrorLoadCategories
data.value: Error occured when was trying to load book categories from file with filename: {0}
data.comment: The message when bot can't load book categories from file. This message is used by the logger.

data.name: LogFailedSearchUserByEmail
data.value: SharePoint returned {0} when was trying to get user data by user email.
data.comment: The message when bot can't find a user by email in SharePoint. This message is used by the logger.

data.name: LogUnsuccessfullyReturned
data.value: User tried to borrow the book "{0}", that had already been returned.
data.comment: The message when the user could not return the book because the book was returned from Sharepoint. This message is used by the logger

data.name: LogWrongSendCode
data.value: Error occurred when was trying to send auth code on email.
data.comment: The message when the bot failed to send a message to the mail. This message is used by the logger

data.name: LogWrongTelegramUpdate
data.value: {0} from telegram Api was null.
data.comment: The message when we received empty updates from telegram.

data.name: LostFilters
data.value: Sorry, we can't find message with categories.
data.comment: The message when bot can't find message with filters in Firebase.

data.name: LostMessage
data.value: Sorry, we lost this message.
data.comment: The message when bot can't find data about message in Firebase.

data.name: NoBookInHistory
data.value: You don't have any book in your history.
data.comment: The message when user doesn't have any book in his history.

data.name: ReturnBookQuestion
data.value: Are you sure you want to return the book "{0}"?
data.comment: The question when a user try to return the book.

data.name: SearchQueryResult
data.value: This is the result of your search query.
data.comment: The message when a user receives a search result by book title.

data.name: SubjectMessageCode
data.value: LibBot verification Token
data.comment: The name of the topic in the message sent by the bot.

data.name: SuccessfullyBorrowed
data.value: The book "{0}" was successfully borrowed!
data.comment: The message when a user successfully borrowed the book.

data.name: SuccessfullyReturned
data.value: The book "{0}" was successfully returned!
data.comment: The message when a user successfully returned the book.

data.name: Thanks
data.value: Thanks!
data.comment: The message "Thanks".

data.name: UnsuccessfullyBorrowed
data.value: Something went wrong. The book "{0}" is already borrowed.
data.comment: The message when a user could not borrow the book because that was borrowed from Sharepoint.

data.name: UnsuccessfullyReturned
data.value: Something went wrong. The book "{0}" is already returned.
data.comment: The message when a user could not return the book because that was returned from Sharepoint.

data.name: UserFilters
data.value: Your categories:
data.comment: The message when a user selects filters.

data.name: User_DbName
data.value: Users
data.comment: The name of the document with users in the database.

data.name: WrongCode
data.value: You entered wrong code.
data.comment: The message when a user entered the wrong code.

data.name: WrongCredentials
data.value: We can't find user with such credentials.
data.comment: The message when bot can't find user credentials in SharePoint.

data.name: WrongDeleteMessage
data.value: We tried delete message, that had sent more than 24 hours ago.
data.comment: The message when bot can't delete message, because that had sent more than 24 hours ago.

data.name: WrongSendCode
data.value: Something go wrong, try again enter outlook email or outlook login.
data.comment: The message when there were problems with the authorization code.
